The fragrance is characterized by dominant herbal notes imbued with peach aroma, Manual men's leather belt made of the highest quality leather, according to the principles of old crafts, Ferrero Rocher, chocolate box with roasted hazelnuts, hazelnut and milk chocolate filling, Wooden box
